short_summary: The government requires collaboration with the Joint Forces Land Component Command (JFLCC) on the development of a media analysis centre to provide strategic communications services and collaborate with NATO.
description: This is an RFP for the media analysis centre project.The purpose of this RFP is to seek the advice and support required to develop and provide accurate contextual analysis of all forms of domestic and international news. separate purchase orders for multiple areas of project scope will be provided.
